Name: ReRoleplay
Text: When you roleplay outside of combat, roll 2d6 and use either roll.

Name: Motivation
Text: You can let an ally in your Zone reroll any roll they make. Only (PIB) rolls can be rerolled per combat session.

Name: Stunt Performer
Text: Add 1 to your rolls when roleplaying in combat.

Name: ',:) Succor'
Text: Allies can add 1 to rolls they make during the Player Phase while in your Zone.

Name: Ensemble
Text: You and your team have (PIB) AP to spend on roleplaying in combat. These AP only restore after combat ends.
